540.description: This application is for students interested in summer work with the Yukon Youth Conservation Corps (Y2C2) or the

542.description: Conservation Action Team (CAT) programs. Please attach a resume. It is highly recommended you look at the Job

543.description: Descriptions available online at www.env.gov.yk.ca/environment-you/y2c2.php. You cannot hold the same Y2C2 position
